thread.title: Testing times for Unisa - comment
thread.title_full: Testing times for Unisa - comment | News24

author: news24.com
title: Testing times for Unisa - comment
text:
What also needs to be considered by Unisa is that the proposed 'take home exams' allows the learner to seek assistance from others or have others complete the assessment for the learner.
This would not reflect the learner's ability.
Therefore, defeating the purpose of the assessment and jeopardizing Unisa's integrity as a credible distance education institution.
